description.value:
Acolyte

Pattern B (Focused)

Skills: Religion 3, Empathy 1, History 1, +36 XP

Equipment: Holy symbol, prayer book, vestments, incense, common clothes

Feature - Shelter of the Faithful: You can receive free healing and care at temples of your faith. Believers will provide food, lodging, and assistance.

Archaeologist

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: History 3, Investigate 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Brush and tools, journal, map case, traveler's clothes, magnifying glass

Feature - Historical Insight: When examining ruins or artifacts, the GM will provide one useful historical fact or context clue.

Artisan

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Craft 2, Society 2, Persuasion 1, Devices 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Artisan's tools (choose type), common clothes, belt pouch

Feature - Guild Membership: You have connections with artisan guilds. Can find work, get fair prices on materials, and access guild resources in cities.

Artist

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Perform 3, Perception 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Artist's tools (paints, instruments, etc.), portfolio, fine clothes

Feature - Artistic Reputation: Your work is recognized. Can earn money through commissions and gain access to wealthy patrons.

Athlete

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Athletics 2, Acrobatics 2, Perform 1, Intimidate 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Sport equipment, trophy, traveler's clothes, oil for muscles

Feature - Competitor's Spirit: You're known in sporting circles. Can find competitions, training facilities, and fellow athletes who respect your dedication.

Bandit

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Stealth 2, Intimidate 2, Wilderness 1, Melee Combat 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Mask or bandana, rope, common clothes (worn), crude weapon

Feature - Outlaw Network: You know how to find and contact criminal elements in the wilderness. Can locate hideouts and fences.

Barber

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Medicine 2, Society 2, Persuasion 1, Devices 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Razor, scissors, comb, soap, towels

Feature - Gossip Network: People talk freely during grooming. You hear rumors and local news before most others.

Barkeep

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Empathy 2, Persuasion 2, Society 2, Perception 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Apron, mug, bottle of spirits, common clothes

Feature - Tavern Talk: You know how to listen and learn. Gain Fortune on skill tests when gathering information in drinking establishments.

Barrister

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Society 3, Persuasion 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Law books, fine clothes, writing materials, seal

Feature - Legal Knowledge: You understand laws and courts. Can navigate legal systems and provide counsel (though not always successfully).

Bookkeeper

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Society 2, Investigate 2, Writing 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Ledger, ink and quill, abacus, reading glasses

Feature - Head for Numbers: You can quickly assess financial records and spot discrepancies or patterns in accounts.

Butcher

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Might 2, Medicine 2, Craft 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Cleaver, cutting board, apron, meat hook

Feature - Anatomy Knowledge: Your understanding of anatomy gives you insight into weak points in living creatures.

Carpenter

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Craft 2, Might 2, Devices 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Carpenter's tools, measuring rope, common clothes, wood samples

Feature - Structural Assessment: You can quickly evaluate the integrity of wooden structures and identify construction methods.

Charlatan

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Deception 2, Persuasion 2, Perform 2, Thievery 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Fine clothes, disguise kit, weighted dice, marked cards

Feature - False Identity: You have created a second identity with documentation. Can switch between identities.

Cook

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Craft 2, Wilderness 2, Perception 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Cook's utensils, spices, apron, recipe book

Feature - Comfort Food: Meals you prepare during rests grant one additional HP recovery (once per rest, applies to whole party).

Courtier

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Persuasion 2, Society 2, Empathy 2, Perform 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Fine clothes, signet ring, perfume, invitation to a ball

Feature - Court Connections: You know how to navigate noble society. Can gain audience with important figures and understand court politics.

Courier

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Athletics 2, Society 2, Perception 1, Wilderness 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Sealed letter pouch, traveler's clothes, map, sturdy boots

Feature - Swift Delivery: You know the fastest routes between settlements and can navigate unfamiliar cities quickly.

Criminal

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Stealth 2, Thievery 2, Deception 2, Intimidate 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Crowbar, dark common clothes, belt pouch, hood

Feature - Criminal Contact: You have a reliable contact in the criminal underworld who can provide information or fence stolen goods.

Driver

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Athletics 2, Society 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Whip, traveler's clothes, map, animal feed

Feature - Beast Handler: You have expertise with draft animals and vehicles. Can handle difficult beasts and assess their condition.

Entertainer

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Perform 2, Persuasion 2, Acrobatics 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Musical instrument or costume, common clothes, face paint

Feature - By Popular Demand: You can find performance venues and earn money entertaining. Crowds recognize your talent.

Farmer

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Might 2, Athletics 1, Craft 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Farming tools, common clothes, seeds, work gloves

Feature - Rural Knowledge: You understand seasons, weather, and crops. Can predict weather and find food in farmlands.

Fisher

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Athletics 2, Perception 1, Craft 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Fishing tackle, net, common clothes, waders

Feature - Water Sense: You understand water, tides, and aquatic life. Can predict weather over water and locate fishing spots.

Gambler

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Deception 2, Empathy 2, Perception 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Dice set, cards, common clothes, lucky charm

Feature - Never Tell the Odds: You have a knack for reading people during games of chance. Fortune on Empathy checks during gambling.

Guard

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Melee Combat 2, Perception 2, Intimidate 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Spear or club, uniform or livery, whistle, manacles

Feature - Watchful Eye: You're trained to spot trouble. Can identify suspicious behavior and know guard procedures.

Herbalist

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Medicine 3, Wilderness 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Herbalism kit, pouches, dried herbs, mortar and pestle

Feature - Plant Lore: You can identify useful plants and create basic remedies. Medicine checks to treat poison have Fortune.

Hermit

Pattern B (Focused)

Skills: Wilderness 3, Medicine 1, Religion 1, +36 XP

Equipment: Simple robes, herbalism kit, prayer beads, walking stick

Feature - Solitary Discovery: During your isolation, you discovered something significant (work with GM). People seek your wisdom.

Hunter

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Ranged Combat 2, Stealth 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Bow or crossbow, arrows/bolts, hunter's clothes, traps

Feature - Tracker: You can track creatures through wilderness. Fortune on Wilderness checks to follow trails or identify animal signs.

Investigator

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Investigate 3, Perception 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Magnifying glass, notebook, ink and quill, fine clothes

Feature - Keen Mind: When examining a crime scene or mystery, the GM will provide one crucial clue or detail others might miss.

Laborer

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Might 2, Athletics 2, Constitution saves 1, Craft 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Work clothes, tools (shovel, hammer, etc.), work gloves, lunch pail

Feature - Hard Worker: You can find manual labor work in any settlement and are trusted by working folk.

Merchant

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Persuasion 2, Society 2, Empathy 2, Investigate 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Merchant's scale, samples of goods, fine clothes, ledger

Feature - Trade Network: You have contacts in merchant guilds. Can assess item values accurately and find buyers/sellers for goods.

Mercenary

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Melee Combat 2, Athletics 2, Intimidate 1, Wilderness 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Weapon of choice, armor scraps, mercenary badge, common clothes

Feature - Soldier of Fortune: You can find mercenary work and are recognized by other sellswords. Know how to negotiate contracts.

Miner

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Might 2, Athletics 2, Perception 1, Craft 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Pick, shovel, lantern, work clothes, rope

Feature - Underground Sense: You can navigate underground spaces and identify minerals and stone quality. Detect unstable areas.

Noble

Pattern B (Focused)

Skills: Society 3, Persuasion 1, History 1, +36 XP

Equipment: Fine clothes, signet ring, purse with coins, perfume

Feature - Position of Privilege: You are of noble birth. Common folk defer to you, and you can secure audiences with authorities.

Nomad

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Athletics 2, Perception 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Tent, traveler's clothes, rope, waterskin

Feature - Wanderer's Knowledge: You know routes and shortcuts across wilderness. Can find nomadic groups who will assist you.

Refugee

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Stealth 2, Wilderness 2, Empathy 1, Society 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Worn clothes, memento from homeland, hidden coins, blanket

Feature - Survivor's Instinct: You know how to avoid danger and find help. Can identify safe havens and sympathetic people.

Sage

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Arcane 3, History 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Books, writing materials, robes, reading glasses

Feature - Researcher: You know how to find information. Have access to libraries and can recall obscure knowledge.

Sailor

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Athletics 2, Acrobatics 2, Perception 1, Wilderness 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Rope, common clothes, knife, lucky charm

Feature - Ship Passage: You can secure free passage on ships and are welcomed in port taverns. Know sailing and nautical matters.

Scholar

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: History 3, Society 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Books, writing materials, robes, reading glasses

Feature - Academic Network: You have connections with universities and scholars. Can access libraries and consult experts.

Servant

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Empathy 2, Society 2, Perception 2, Stealth 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Uniform or livery, common clothes, cleaning supplies

Feature - Invisible Presence: Servants are often overlooked. You can blend into servile settings and overhear conversations.

Shepherd

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Wilderness 2, Perception 2, Athletics 1, Medicine 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Crook, sling, common clothes, waterskin, blanket

Feature - Animal Empathy: You understand animal behavior. Can calm domesticated animals and predict their actions.

Smith

Pattern D (Specialist)

Skills: Craft 3, Might 2, +32 XP

Equipment: Smith's tools, hammer, apron, work gloves

Feature - Master Craftsman: You can repair weapons and armor in the field. Can assess metal quality and craftsmanship.

Smuggler

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Stealth 2, Deception 2, Society 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Dark clothes, fake documents, hidden pouches, rope

Feature - Hidden Routes: You know secret passages and smuggling routes. Can move goods past authorities and find black markets.

Soldier

Pattern B (Focused)

Skills: Melee Combat 3, Athletics 1, Intimidate 1, +36 XP

Equipment: Uniform, weapon of choice, rank insignia, bedroll

Feature - Military Rank: You have (or had) rank in an army. Can secure lodging at military posts and understand military protocols.

Squire

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Melee Combat 2, Athletics 2, Society 1, Empathy 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Simple weapon, squire's tabard, grooming kit, polish

Feature - Knight's Training: You were trained in chivalry and combat. Recognized by noble warriors and can invoke codes of honor.

Tailor

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Craft 2, Society 2, Perception 1, Persuasion 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Sewing kit, fabric samples, measuring tape, fine clothes

Feature - Fashion Sense: You understand clothing and status. Can identify someone's social position by their attire and create disguises.

Teacher

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Society 2, History 2, Persuasion 1, Empathy 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Books, writing materials, robes, teaching aids

Feature - Educator: You can explain complex topics simply. When teaching skills to others, they learn faster (GM discretion).

Urchin

Pattern A (Generalist)

Skills: Stealth 2, Thievery 2, Acrobatics 2, Society 2, +24 XP

Equipment: Ragged clothes, small knife, hidden stash location, rat friend

Feature - Street Connections: You know the streets and alleys. Can find urchin informants and navigate cities quickly.

Ward

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Society 2, History 2, Empathy 1, Perception 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Fine clothes (slightly worn), book, writing materials, memento

Feature - Noble Education: You were raised in a noble household. Understand etiquette and can navigate high society (though not with full privilege).

Weaver

Pattern C (Balanced)

Skills: Craft 2, Perception 2, Society 1, Devices 1, +40 XP

Equipment: Loom (portable), thread, fabric samples, common clothes

Feature - Textile Expertise: You understand fabrics and their properties. Can identify quality, origin, and create useful cloth items.
